Alfin Lestaluhu, Bek Andalan yang Punya Suara Azan Merdu
01 Nov 2019, 07:07 by , https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Alfin Lestaluhu (tengah) merupakan bek andalan Timnas Indonesia U-16. (CNN Indonesia/Andry Novelino)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia -- Bek Timnas Indonesia U-16 Alfin Lestaluhu yang meninggal pada Kamis (31/10) malam dikenal sebagai pemain bertahan yang tangguh dan rajin beribadah.Alfin adalah salah satu andalan Timnas Indonesia U-16 asuhan Bima Sakti. Direkrut dari SKO Ragunan, bek kelahiran 2004 itu selalu bermain di Piala AFF U-15 2019 ketika Indonesia merebut posisi ketiga.Alfin kemudian kembali menjadi andalan tim Garuda Asia ketika tampil di Kualifikasi Piala Asia U-16 2020 yang berlangsung di Jakarta, September lalu. Ketika itu Alfin mencetak satu gol ke gawang Filipina dan membawa Indonesia lolos ke putaran final di Bahrain.Bima Sakti melalui akun Instagram miliknya sering memberi informasi mengenai Alfin. Mantan kapten Timnas Indonesia itu mengatakan Alfin bukan hanya tangguh di atas lapangan, tapi juga punya karakter yang positif di luar lapangan. Bima mengatakan Alfin rajin beribadah dan memiliki suara azan yang merdu.



"Tetap kuat Alfin, seperti kekuatanmu serta pengorbananmu untuk mengejar cita-citamu menjadi pemain Timnas. Seperti karaktermu yang selalu kau tunjukkan di dalam lapangan, yang tak kenal lelah dan kompromi menghalau, mengadang semua serangan lawan dalam setiap pertandingan," tulis Bima melalui Instagram sebelum Alfin meninggal."Terima kasih kepada bapak Erwin Syahril Al Thaib Lestaluhu beserta ibu yang telah mendidik Alfin. Dia anak baik, sopan, rajin beribadah dan satu lagi suara azannya merdu sekali. Luar biasa," tulis Bima.



Bima juga menjadi orang pertama yang mengabarkan kabar meninggalnya Alfin. "Innalillahi wainnailaihi rojiun. Selamat jalan Alfin semoga husnul khotimah, terima kasih atas perjuanganmu buat bangsa ini. Kau telah berjuang tanpa kenal lelah, tanpa rasa takut sedikitpun seperti pesan kedua orang tuamu, jasamu pasti kami kenang dan meneruskan cita-citamu agar Timnas ke depan bisa lebih baik lagi," tulis Bima lewat Instagram.Alfin meninggal dunia di Rumah Sakit Harapan Kita, Jakarta, pukul 22.11 WIB pada Kamis (31/10). PSSI mengabarkan Alfin meninggal karena penyakit encephalitis (infeksi otak). (har)

Alfin Lestaluhu, the mainstay defender who has a melodious Azan voice
01 Nov 2019, 07:07 by, https://www.facebook.com/CNNIndonesia


Alfin Lestaluhu (center) is a mainstay defender of the Indonesian National Team U-16. (CNN Indonesia / Andry Novelino)

Jakarta, CNN Indonesia - Indonesian U-16 national team defender Alfin Lestaluhu who died on Thursday (10/31) night is known as a tough defender and diligent in worship. Alfin is one of the mainstays of the Indonesian Under-16 national team under the care of the Milky Way. Recruited from SKO Ragunan, the 2004-born defender always played in the AFF U-15 2019 Cup when Indonesia took third place. Alffin then returned to being the mainstay of the Garuda Asia team when he appeared in the U-16 2020 Asian Cup Qualification which took place in Jakarta last September. At that time Alfin scored one goal against the Philippines and took Indonesia through to the finals in Bahrain. Milky Way through his Instagram account often gave information about Alfin. The former Indonesian national team captain said Alfin was not only tough on the pitch, but also had a positive character outside the field. Bima said Alfin diligently worshiped and had a sweet call to prayer.



"Stay strong Alfin, like your strength and your sacrifice to pursue your dreams of becoming a national team player. Like your character that you always show in the field, who is tireless and compromises dispel, block all the opponent's attacks in every game," wrote Bima through Instagram before Instagram Alfin died. "Thank you to Mr. Erwin Syahril Al Thaib Lestaluhu along with the mother who educated Alfin. He is a good boy, polite, diligent in worship and one of his admirable melodious sounds," said Bima.



Bima was also the first person to preach the news of Alfin's death. "Innalillahi wainnailaihi rojiun. Goodbye Alfin, I hope that Husnul Khotimah, thank you for your struggle for this nation. You have fought tirelessly, without the slightest fear like your parents' messages, your services will surely be remembered and continue your aspirations for the national team going forward. could be even better, "Bima wrote via Instagram. Alffin died at Harapan Kita Hospital, Jakarta, at 22.11 WIB on Thursday (10/31). PSSI reported that Alfin died of encephalitis (brain infection). (har)
